GSD.product_version: versions from v5.12 to before v5.15.77
GSD.description:
net: broadcom: bcm4908_enet: update TX stats after actual transmission

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.77 by commit c9589e18a60c55c76772a38117ef9a16b942e56b, it was introduced in version v5.12 by commit 4feffeadbcb2e5b11cbbf191a33c245b74a5837b. For more details please see the references link.
